title: Insurance; establish minimum requirements for certain large motor vehicles not subject to minimums under Motor Carrier Regulatory Law.
subject: Insurance

extras.summary: AN ACT TO CREATE NEW SECTION 77-7-88, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO ESTABLISH MINIMUM INSURANCE REQUIREMENTS FOR CERTAIN LARGE MOTOR VEHICLES OPERATING UPON THE PUBLIC HIGHWAYS OF THIS STATE WHICH ARE OTHERWISE NOT SUBJECT TO THE MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS FOR CERTAIN COMMON CARRIERS, CONTRACT CARRIERS AND INTERSTATE CARRIERS; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 77-7-7, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH DEFINES CERTAIN TERMS USED UNDER THE MISSISSIPPI MOTOR CARRIER REGULATORY LAW OF 1938, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTIONS 77-7-83, 77-7-85 AND 77-7-87, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATE TO MINIMUM INSURANCE REQUIREMENTS FOR COMMON CARRIERS, CONTRACT CARRIERS AND INTERSTATE CARRIERS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
